name: Raid The Dungeon
description:
Hello,

Please feel free to try my 3D RPG game. You will be exploring different levels of dungeons full of traps and enemies but more importantly LOOT ! In between raids you can use the loot to buy new equipment and fun potions to help you with your adventure.

The game is a small demonstration of what I learned about Unreal Engine. The game is made with C++ and a bit of blueprints, all the 3D and UI assets are made in Blender. All the work, apart from the sounds, has been done by me.

Have fun with it, enjoy and please tell me what you think of it!
